Html: It's possible to record (or mix) MIC + Speakers at same time using WASAPI ? Now i can record only speakers...

I'm afraid I don't know the answer to this. It might even be to do with your soundcard drivers. Some have a "what you hear" mode that lets you do this.

You could also look into loopback recording mode (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd316551%28v=vs.85%29.aspx) to see if that does what you need.
